DOC.brief_title: Role Soy Supplementation Prostate Cancer Development
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study evaluate effectiveness direct effect commercial soy supplement prostate cancer normal prostate tissue . Patients randomize either receive placebo commercial soy supplement 2-4 week prior plan surgery treatment prostate cancer . The specific objective : 1 . To assess effect soy supplementation endogenous hormone production level serum prostate specific antigen . 2 . To assess impact soy supplementation estrogen receptor expression ( ER ) . 3 . To determine impact soy isoflavones cell cycle regulation associate gene expression .
DOC.criteria: Histologically proven prostate cancer . Surgical candidate prostatectomy . During study period , must agree take new supplement . No concurrent chemotherapy , radiation hormonal therapy . No history prior allergy soy base product . Must take soy supplement soy isoflavones within 90 day prior study enrollment . Must able safely study supplement period least two week prior schedule prostatectomy . Must give write informed consent accordance institutional federal guideline .
